explains: adv. 注意地；聚精会神地；周到地

sentences.en: She soon knew them, too, for she had listened attentively.
sentences.cn: 她很快也认出了它们，因为她一直在聚精会神地听着。

sentences.en: A squirrel was perched on Dickon's bent back attentively nibbling a nut.
sentences.cn: 一只松鼠蹲在狄肯弯着的背上，专心地啃着一颗坚果。

sentences.en: Heidi had listened attentively, and said now with sparkling eyes, "If I could only read already!"
sentences.cn: 海蒂聚精会神地听着，眼睛闪闪发光地说：“我要是能读书就好了！”
